name: Timmy in the Perplexed World of Missing Numbers
name_original: Timmy in the Perplexed World of Missing Numbers
description:
Poor Timmy... Timmy can't catch a break from numbers... The night before his big math test he wants to run away from anything with numbers!

Help Timmy get out of this perplexed world of missing numbers by gathering all the numbers! 

What makes it worst is that this wolf guy just doesn't understand.. Timmy just wants his life to be numbers free!!

WASD - Movement
(Collect all numbers on the ground to complete game)

Disclaimer ("Prototype scoped too high and had to descope for this game.  I hate game loops.... haha they are soooo much fun!! *sarcasm* I enjoyed the process I'm unsure where I will go with this project I did really like bringing things together to get a complete-ish prototype w some bugs. Hope ya'll enjoy")
 

Comments are much appreciated :)
-Lex-
